make_request.name: Make HTTP request
make_request.description: Perform an HTTP GET or POST request and return the result as the service response.

params.name: Query parameters
params.description: Optional query parameters for the request (object/dict).

data.name: POST data
data.description: Optional data to send in the body of a POST request (object/dict).

body.name: POST body
body.description: Optional raw data to send as the POST body (string). If provided, this is used instead of 'data'.
